original: Vipākadhammadhammaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: vipāka dhamma dhammam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Vipākadhammadhammaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: vipāka dhamma dhammam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
